plot: A chauffeur attempts to steal his employer's multi-million dollar necklace. To this end, it is necessary for him to kill the people who protect her, one-by-one.
title: Bul gaemi
plot_es: A chauffeur attempts to steal his employer's multi-million dollar necklace. To this end, it is necessary for him to kill the people who protect her, one-by-one.
plot_en: A chauffeur attempts to steal his employer's multi-million dollar necklace. To this end, it is necessary for him to kill the people who protect her, one-by-one.
